meanings.definition: The condition or quality of being transsexual.
meanings.sent1: Many people study transsexualities to understand more about gender identity.
meanings.sent2: The clinic offers support groups for individuals exploring their transsexualities.
meanings.sent3: Learning about transsexualities can help promote acceptance and understanding.
meanings.sent4: Her journey of self-discovery led her to embrace her transsexualities.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of transsexualities adds richness to our understanding of human experiences.

meanings.definition: The state of identifying with a gender different from the one assigned at birth.
meanings.sent1: Understanding transsexualities involves recognizing personal gender identity.
meanings.sent2: She bravely shared her journey of embracing her transsexualities with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously explored the concept of transsexualities.
meanings.sent4: His bold fashion choices reflected his unique transsexualities.
meanings.sent5: The novel beautifully portrayed the struggles and triumphs of transsexualities.
